CustomField.description:
Value Source: Below workflow rules to update count for the no. of times the Lead Status is changed to either Automation Qualified or Marketing Qualified.
1. Lead Update Count on # of Time Hit MQ/AQ for MQ or AQ Lead Status 2. Lead Update count on # of Time Hit MQ/AQ for MQ or AQ Lead Status Subsequent Change
CustomField.label: Number Of Times MQ Or AQ
